    • Method Detail

      • createChatColorInventory

        public static void createChatColorInventory()
        Creates the ChatColor Inventory GUI. To be used on startup if enabled.

      • setChatColor

        public static void setChatColor(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack clickedStack)
        Sets the player's default chat color based on the clicked item.
        Parameters:
        player - The player to set color for.
        clickedStack - The ItemStack they clicked.

      • isChatColorInventory

        public static java.lang.Boolean isChatColorInventory(org.bukkit.inventory.Inventory invToCheck)
        Checks if the specified inventory is the ChatColor GUI.
        Parameters:
        invToCheck - The inventory to check.
        Returns:
        True if they are the same, else false.

      • getChatColorInventory

        Gets the Inventory used for setting chat color via a GUI
        Returns:
        The chatColor Inventory.
